sqlMap.select:
Select * From s_sys_privilege
uuid=#uuid# is_ajax=#is_ajax# privilege_name like '%'+#privilege_name#+'%')
Order By PRIVILEGE_TYPE,MENU_PRIORITY,LM_TIME
sqlMap.update: Update s_sys_privilege Set privilege_name=#privilege_name#, parent_privilege=#parent_privilege#, descriptions=#descriptions#, privilege_id=#privilege_id#, privilege_type=#privilege_type#, is_ajax=#is_ajax#, ajax_map_id=#ajax_map_id#, is_menu=#is_menu#, menu_url=#menu_url#, menu_target=#menu_target#, menu_priority=#menu_priority#, menu_title=#menu_title#, lm_user=#lm_user#, lm_time=#lm_time#, module=#module# Where uuid=#uuid#
sqlMap.select:
Select * From s_sys_role Where role_type=1
uuid=#uuid#
uuid In #roles[]#
ORDER BY role_name

Select * From s_sys_role Where role_type=0
uuid=#uuid#
uuid In #roles[]#
ORDER BY role_rank
sqlMap.update: Update qkj_t_indexdetail Set kpi=#kpi#, weight=#weight#, count_way=#count_way#, definition=#definition#, correctly=#correctly#, check_deptcode=#check_deptcode#, check_post=#check_post#, isdept=#isdept#, position_dept=#position_dept#, type=#type#, cyc=#cyc# Where uuid=#dept_code#
Update s_sys_role Set role_name=#role_name#, role_type=#role_type#, role_rank=#role_rank#, descriptions=#descriptions#, lm_user=#lm_user#, lm_time=#lm_time# Where uuid=#uuid#
sqlMap.select:
Select p.privilege_id,p.parent_privilege,p.privilege_name From s_sys_privilege p WHERE p.PRIVILEGE_TYPE = 1
Order By p.MENU_PRIORITY,p.LM_TIME
Select p.privilege_id,p.parent_privilege,p.privilege_name From s_sys_privilege p WHERE p.PRIVILEGE_TYPE = 0

SELECT r.uuid, p.privilege_name, p.parent_privilege, r.role_id, p.privilege_id, r.type, r.function1, l.role_name FROM s_sys_role l, s_sys_roleprvg r LEFT JOIN s_sys_privilege p ON p.privilege_id = r.privilege_id WHERE r.role_id = l.uuid
r.uuid=#uuid# role_id=#role_id#
role_id In #roles[]#
Order By l.UUID,p.PRIVILEGE_TYPE,p.MENU_PRIORITY
sqlMap.update: Update s_sys_roleprvg r Set r.type = #type#, r.function1 = #function# Where r.role_id = #role_id# And r.privilege_id = #privilege_id#
sqlMap.delete:
delete from s_sys_roleprvg where 1=1
role_id = #role_id# privilege_id=#privilege_id#
sqlMap.select:
Select d.*,pd.dept_cname pardname From s_sys_department d LEFT JOIN s_sys_department pd on (d.parent_dept=pd.dept_code) Where 1=1
d.uuid=#uuid# d.type=#type# d.dept_code=#dept_code#
d.dept_code In #dept_codes[]#
d.dept_code Like #check_code#+'%') ORDER BY d.DEPT_CODE
sqlMap.delete:
delete from qkj_t_indexdetail where 1=1
uuid = #uuid# privilege_id=#privilege_id#
sqlMap.select:
Select i.* From qkj_t_indexdetail i Where 1=1
i.uuid=#uuid# i.dept_code=#dept_code# i.position_id=#positionid# i.position_dept=#position_dept# i.isdept=#isdept#
i.type=#type#
(i.type='1' or ISNULL(i.type, '0')='0')
(i.type=2 or i.type=3) i.kpi=#kpi# i.check_deptcode=#check_deptcode# i.check_post=#check_post#

Select DISTINCT i.uuid,d.dept_cname dname,p.POSITION_NAME postion,pd.dept_cname pdname,position_dept.dept_cname po_deptname, checkde.dept_cname checkde,checkp.POSITION_NAME checkp, CASE i.isdept when 1 then '纵向' when 0 then '横向' end as isdeptname, case i.type when 1 then '无' when 2 then '取部门同项kpi' when 3 then '取部门总分' end as typename, i.dept_code,i.kpi,i.cyc,i.weight,i.isdept,i.position_id,i.type,i.position_dept,i.count_way,i.definition,i.correctly From qkj_t_indexdetail i LEFT JOIN s_sys_department d on(i.dept_code=d.dept_code) LEFT JOIN s_sys_department pd on(i.position_dept=pd.dept_code) left join s_cfg_position p on (i.position_id=p.uuid) left join s_sys_department position_dept on (p.dept_code=position_dept.dept_code) left join s_sys_department checkde on(i.check_deptcode=checkde.dept_code) left join s_cfg_position checkp on (i.check_post=checkp.UUID) Where 1=1
ISNULL(i.dept_code, '0')='0' and ISNULL(i.position_id, '0')<>'0' ISNULL(i.dept_code, '0')<>'0' and ISNULL(i.position_id, '0')='0'

Select DISTINCT i.uuid,i.* From qkj_t_indexdetail i left join qkj_r_sonscore s on(i.uuid=s.check_index) Where 1=1
i.uuid=#uuid# i.dept_code=#dept_code# i.position_id=#positionid# i.position_dept=#position_dept# i.isdept=#isdept# i.type=#type# i.kpi=#kpi# i.check_deptcode=#check_deptcode# i.check_post=#check_post#

select 1 uuid from qkj_r_sonscore ss left join qkj_r_score s on (ss.score_id=s.uuid) where (ss.check_index in ( Select i.uuid From qkj_t_indexdetail i Where i.position_dept=#dept_code# and i.type=2 and i.kpi=1) or ss.check_index IN ( select id.uuid from qkj_t_indexdetail id LEFT JOIN s_cfg_position p on (id.position_id=p.UUID) left join s_sys_user u on (u.[POSITION]=p.UUID) where id.type=3 and u.DEPT_CODE=#dept_code# ) ) and s.check_ym=#check_ym#

Select dept_code From s_sys_department
uuid=#uuid# dept_code Like #dept_code# parent_dept = #parent_dept#
ORDER BY DEPT_CODE
sqlMap.update: Update s_sys_department Set dept_code=#dept_code#, parent_dept=#parent_dept#, dept_ename=#dept_ename#, dept_cname=#dept_cname#, descriptions=#descriptions#, type=#type#, lm_user=#lm_user#, lm_time=#lm_time# Where uuid=#uuid#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT DISTINCT u.uuid,u.*,r.ROLE_NAME TYPE_NAME,d.DEPT_CNAME,d.type depttype,par.type partype,u2.USER_NAME AS senior_name,p.POSITION_NAME, pu.USER_NAME parent_user_name,pud.dept_cname p_dname,pud.dept_code p_code,par.dept_cname pardname,ppar.dept_cname pparname FROM s_sys_user u LEFT JOIN s_sys_department d ON (u.dept_code = d.dept_code) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user u2 ON (u.SENIOR = u2.UUID) LEFT JOIN s_sys_role r ON (u.USER_TYPE = r.UUID) LEFT JOIN s_cfg_position p ON (u.POSITION = p.UUID) LEFT JOIN s_sys_userdept ud ON(ud.user_id=u.UUID) left join s_sys_user pu on(pu.UUID=u.parent_user) left join s_sys_department pud on(pud.dept_code=pu.DEPT_CODE) left join s_sys_department par on(par.dept_code=d.parent_dept) left join s_sys_department ppar on (ppar.dept_code=par.parent_dept) Where 1=1
u.uuid=#uuid# u.parent_user=#parent_user# u.title=#title# u.user_name like #user_name# u.email like #email# u.mobile like #mobile# u.status=#status# u.position=#position# p.position_grade=#position_grade# p.POSITION_NAME like '%'+#post# +'%'
u.dept_code=#dept_code#
u.dept_code like #dept_codelist# +'%'
ud.dept_code in ($dept_codeds$)
ud.dept_code In #apply_perdepts[]# u.uuid=#apply_userDouble#
u.position In #positions[]#

select u.uuid from s_sys_user u where 1=1
u.uuid=#uuid# u.parent_user=#parent_user#

SELECT u.*,p.POSITION_NAME position_name FROM s_sys_user u join s_cfg_position p on (u.[POSITION]=p.uuid) Where 1=1
u.uuid=#uuid#

select u.*,id.uuid id_uid,id.kpi kpi,id.weight w,id.position_dept pd,id.type type from s_sys_user u left JOIN s_cfg_position p on (u.[POSITION]=p.uuid) left join qkj_t_indexdetail id on (id.position_id=p.UUID) Where 1=1
u.uuid=#uuid# (id.type=2 or id.type=3) id.position_dept=#position_dept#
sqlMap.update: Update s_sys_user Set ukeys=#ukeys#, dept_code=#dept_code#, user_roles=#user_roles#, user_type=#user_type#, extra_prvg=#extra_prvg#, work_id=#work_id#, user_name=#user_name#, sex=#sex#, email=#email#, phone=#phone#, mobile=#mobile#, position=#position#, descriptions=#descriptions#, status=#status#, filesystem_root=#filesystem_root#, lm_user=#lm_user#, parent_user=#parent_user#, lm_time=#lm_time# Where uuid=#uuid#

Update s_sys_user Set parent_user=#parent_user#
Where uuid In #uuids[]#

Update s_sys_user Set dept_code=#dept_code#
Where uuid In #uuids[]#

Update s_sys_userdept Set dept_code=#dept_code#
where user_id In #uuids[]#
Update s_sys_user Set dept_code=#dept_code# Where uuid=#uuid#
Update s_sys_user Set user_name=#user_name#, sex=#sex#, email=#email#, phone=#phone#, mobile=#mobile#, descriptions=#descriptions#, lm_user=#lm_user#, lm_time=#lm_time# Where title=#title#
Update s_sys_user Set user_sign=#user_sign# Where uuid=#uuid#
Update s_sys_user Set passwords=#passwords#, lm_user=#lm_user#, lm_time=#lm_time# Where uuid=#uuid#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT u.*,d.DEPT_CNAME,u2.USER_NAME AS senior_name FROM s_sys_user u LEFT JOIN s_sys_department d ON (u.dept_code = d.dept_code) LEFT JOIN s_sys_user u2 ON (u.SENIOR = u2.UUID)
(u.TITLE = #title# OR u.MOBILE = #title#) u.STATUS = #status#

SELECT Count(*) FROM s_sys_user u
u.TITLE = #title# u.mobile = #mobile# u.email = #email#

Select p.*,d.dept_cname dept_cname From s_cfg_position p left join s_sys_department d on (d.dept_code=p.dept_code)
p.uuid=#uuid# p.position_name like '%'+#position_name# +'%'
p.dept_code=#dept_code2#
p.dept_code=#dept_code3#
p.dept_code=#dept_code# p.dept_code LIKE #dept_code#+'%')
ORDER BY POSITION_GRADE

Select p.* From s_cfg_position p join s_sys_user u on (p.uuid=u.[POSITION])
p.uuid=#uuid# u.uuid=#u_id#
sqlMap.update: Update s_cfg_position Set position_name = #position_name#, position_senior=#position_senior#, position_grade = #position_grade#, position_attribute = #position_attribute#, position_note = #position_note#, lm_user = #lm_user#, dept_code=#dept_code#, lm_time = #lm_time# Where uuid = #uuid#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT UUID,PRIVILEGE_ID,PRIVILEGE_NAME,PARENT_PRIVILEGE,MENU_URL,MENU_TARGET,MENU_TITLE,module,MENU_PRIORITY FROM s_sys_privilege Where is_menu = 1 And PRIVILEGE_TYPE = 1
privilege_id In #user_permits[]#
Order By MENU_PRIORITY,LM_TIME

SELECT UUID,PRIVILEGE_ID,PRIVILEGE_NAME,PARENT_PRIVILEGE,MENU_URL,MENU_TARGET,MENU_TITLE,module FROM s_sys_privilege Where is_menu = 1 And PRIVILEGE_TYPE = 0
privilege_id In #user_permits[]#
Order By MENU_PRIORITY,LM_TIME

SELECT ud.*,d.dept_cname dept_cname,p.POSITION_NAME position_name FROM s_sys_userdept ud LEFT JOIN s_sys_department d ON (ud.dept_code=d.dept_code) LEFT JOIN s_cfg_position p ON (ud.position = p.UUID)
ud.uuid=#uuid# ud.user_id=#user_id#
ORDER BY uuid
sqlMap.update: Update s_sys_userdept Set dept_code = #dept_code#, position=#position#, depsubover=#depsubover#, subover = #subover#, roles = #roles#, prvgs = #prvgs#, lm_time = #lm_time#, ischeckdept=#ischeckdept# Where uuid = #uuid#
